list.name: 변경
list.comment:
feat: Initial setup for Kafka consumer project
Initial commit for the mail and message consumer project.
This commit sets up the basic Spring Boot project structure and includes: - Project initialization using Spring Initializr. - Configuration of Kafka bootstrap servers, consumer group ID, and topic names in application.properties. - Basic Kafka consumer implementation using @KafkaListener to receive messages from 'mail-topic' and 'message-topic'.
